io.micronaut.build.testresources

Class AbstractTestResourcesMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.micronaut.build.testresources.AbstractTestResourcesMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MicronautStartTestResourcesServerMojo, MicronautStopTestResourcesServerMojo

    public abstract class AbstractTestResourcesMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Base mojo for Micronaut test resources service handling.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected File buildDirectory 
      static String CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX 
      static String DISABLED 
      protected Boolean keepAlive
      Whether the test resources service should be kept alive after the build.
      protected boolean shared
      Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds (e.g different projects, even built with different build tools).
      protected boolean testResourcesEnabled
      Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
